parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Pre-defined variable for the blufor [[Side|side]].
<br>Alias for [[west]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''blufor'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[side]] [[player]] == [[blufor]]) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] "BLUFOR";
};
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[side]], [[civilian]], [[east]], [[independent]], [[opfor]], [[resistance]], [[west]]
</value></part></template></root>
